name: EventDisconnect
description: This event is fired when the player disconnects from a server. Backed by class `EventDisconnect`.
overview:
Behavior:
* Fires when the player disconnects from any server
* The `reason` field contains the disconnect message
* This event fires before returning to the main menu
* Can be used for cleanup or logging server sessions
* Not cancellable

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
